publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4357.1 Karen Whitefield: Local Newspaper Week, 8 to 14 May 2006—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4357) in the name of Cathy Peattie, insert at end "and congratulates the Wishaw Press and Airdrie and Coatbridge Advertiser on their high standards of journalism and, in particular, congratulates the Airdrie and Coatbridge Advertiser on the excellent campaign that it has been running in partnership with the local community to save accident and emergency services at Monklands Hospital." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4357.1 Local Newspaper Week, 8 to 14 May 2006 (lodged on 8 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4357.1 Karen Whitefield: Local Newspaper Week, 8 to 14 May 2006—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4357) in the name of Cathy Peattie, insert at end "and congratulates the Wishaw Press and Airdrie and Coatbridge Advertiser on their high standards of journalism and, in particular, congratulates the Airdrie and Coatbridge Advertiser on the excellent campaign that it has been running in partnership with the local community to save accident and emergency services at Monklands Hospital." Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-4357.1 Local Newspaper Week, 8 to 14 May 2006 (lodged on 8 May 2006) John Swinburne*
